MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G69 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in in Hollowfield Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:03pm. Our engineers have arrived on site are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:11pm on Wednesday the 28th April 2021
